title: Optimizing Engineering Education Environments: Reflective Instructional Design and Adaptive Teaching Methods Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Designed for learners with experience in engineering-related job training design as corporate educators or mid-level managers, in an environment enabling practical exercises using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the three domains of the OLEET model (student composition, engineering topics, instructor competencies) to modify teaching strategies
Learners can apply protocols to resolve real-world problems in instructional design through reflective practice
Learners can select adaptive teaching methods (Active Learning, motivation strategies, etc.) based on learner characteristics (work experience, learning styles) and content complexity
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
